dcterms:creator: Ting-Yun Chang
Ta-Chung Chi
Shang-Chi Tsai
Yun-Nung Chen
dcterms:description: The dataset is used to analyze whether contextualized word embeddings can indicate the corresponding sense definitions, focusing on learning a mapping between the semantic space of contextualized word embeddings and the space of definition embeddings.
dcterms:title: Online Oxford Dictionary Dataset

dcterms:creator: Mohammad Taher Pilehvar
Jose Camacho-Collados
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 10,000 example pairs for evaluating context-sensitive representations, focusing on determining whether the word senses in two contexts are the same.
dcterms:title: Word-in-Context (WiC)
